price: Pa kad se smjestiš u lađu, ti i oni koji su uz tebe, reci: “Hvala Allahu Koji nas je spasio naroda koji je nepravedan!”
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسۡتَوَيۡتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ فَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā is'tawayta anta waman maʿaka ʿalā al-ful'ki faquli al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī najjānā mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
